participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys expressing herself through cooking and baking. She has a warm and friendly demeanor, making her approachable and easy to talk to.
participant_1.background: I met the love of my life while working at the hospital. I like to make boats on the weekends. I wish that I could be an animal. I enjoy baking and cooking. I do care about my appearance, but it's not my main focus.

participant_2.name: Brian
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and reflective, Brian has a passion for life and enjoys exploring new hobbies. He is laid-back but has a zest for learning, especially in the kitchen.
participant_2.background: I remember my mom reading me books when I was little. When I am not touring with the band, I like to garden. I'm 49, male, and live in Dublin, Ireland. I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes. I enjoy a day of fishing on my Viking boat.

content.text: I love to read. I have always been a huge reader. My mom read to me all the time when I was little.
That's awesome. I love to cook and bake. I like to experiment with new recipes.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make bread. I also love to make desserts.
Yum! I love bread. I've been trying to learn how to make it.
It's not as hard as you think. There are a lot of great recipes online.
I'll have to check some out.
What kind of bread do you like to make?
I like to make french bread. It's so delicious.
French bread is my favorite. I love the crust.
Me too. It's so flaky and delicious.
I love to garden. I have a big garden in my backyard. I grow all kinds of vegetables and herbs.
That's awesome. I wish I had a garden.
You should get one. It's so much fun.
I might have to look into that.
